name: inactive Shanghai doll
description: It is a child between science that incorporates electronic brains and enhances thinking ability. A defensive doll with a cross sword, attacking the enemy semi-autonomously. It starts when it uses it.

use_action.friendly_msg: When I blew in magic, the Shanghai doll flew away and began vigilance around.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the Shanghai doll became an enemy!

name: inactive Ooedo explosive doll
description: It is a child between science that incorporates electronic brains and enhances thinking ability. A self-destructing doll with a hand grenade that attacks the enemy semi-autonomously. It starts when it uses it.

use_action.friendly_msg: When the magic was blown in, the Ooedo explosive doll took off and began to search for enemies. You should take a distance with the doll.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic does not go well, and the Ooedo explosive doll has become an enemy! Let's run away.

name: inactive Goliath doll
description: A Goliath doll completed at the end of the fusion of modern science and magic technology. A fighter doll with a sword in each hand, attack the enemy semi-autonomously. The prototype nanomachine with magic technology has achieved a self-healing function. It is usually miniaturized and becomes large when it starts.

use_action.friendly_msg: Goliath doll flew away when it blew in magic, and it began to watch around.
use_action.hostile_msg: Goliath doll has become an enemy because control of the magic does not go well!

name: inactive Goliath doll v2
description: It is a Goliath doll that has been armed and remodeled with AI. All of the learned skills are spent. With a large chain saw and a built-in shield with a laser gun in hand. Boosters mounted on the back provide high evasive performance and can handle almost every conceivable case.

use_action.friendly_msg: Goliath doll breaks away when it blows in magical power and began to watch out for the surroundings.
use_action.hostile_msg: Goliath doll has become an enemy because control of magic does not go well!

name: inactive Goliath doll v3
description: It is a Goliath doll that has been armed and remodeled with AI. All of the learned skills are spent. Please be careful not to lose sight as you are in the wide alert mode.

use_action.friendly_msg: Goliath doll flew away and began to watch over a wide area when blew in magic.
use_action.hostile_msg: Goliath doll became an enemy because control of magic does not go well.

name: broken Shanghai doll
description: It is a doll that has been broken in vain. It closed its eyes to sleep and it do not move. If you care carefully, you can use it again.

name: broken Ooedo explosive doll
description: It is a doll full of roses. It closed its eyes to sleep and it do not move. If you care carefully, you can use it again.

name: inactive Goliath doll
description: It is a doll that has been broken in vain. It closed its eyes to sleep and it does not move.

name: inactive Goliath doll v2
description: It is a doll that has been broken in vain. It closed its eyes to sleep and it does not move.

name: inactive Goliath doll v3
description: It is a doll that has been broken in vain. It closed its eyes to sleep and it does not move.
